author: Marilyn Severson
text:
We are seeking some effective but fun and creative ways to elicit insights on those emerging issues (changing circumstances or evolving environmental factors)  that are most likely to impact how our organization - and specific departments - will need to operate within the near future (the next 2-3 years.)
Because our Supervisors are our ears and eyes on the ground we need their unique perspectives about what we might be facing so that we can proactively plan.
We have about 200 supervisors - and we are considering monthly lunch meetings with our Assistant and City Managers as hosts.
We want to get the best thinking and active engagement from our Supervisors.
Anyone done something such as this?
title: how to elicit ideas for emerging issues from our Supervisors
